workspace.name: mlw-sw-explore-triples
workspace.query: # # show distinct types in the triplestore # Note: "a" is shorthand for rdf:type # select distinct ?o where { ?s a ?o }

# # show all the teams in the triplestore # Note: "a" is shorthand for rdf:type #
PREFIX dbont: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> select ?teamIRI ?teamName where { ?teamIRI a dbont:SoccerClub ; foaf:name ?teamName . }

# # explore Mexico dbpedia dataset # show triples with Mexico_national_football_team as subject or object # # #
select ?s ?p ?o where { ?s ?p ?o FILTER ( (?s=<http://dbpedia.org/resource/Mexico_national_football_team>) || (?o=<http://dbpedia.org/resource/Mexico_national_football_team>) ) } order by ?s

# # explore Mexico wfb dataset # show triples with MX as subject or object # # #
select ?s ?p ?o where { ?s ?p ?o filter ( ?s=<http://www.daml.org/2001/09/countries/fips#MX> || ?o=<http://www.daml.org/2001/09/countries/fips#MX> ) } order by ?s
